00020 #include "IpaDatasetLoader.h"
00021 #include "brics_3d/core/ColoredPoint3D.h"

00023 namespace brics_3d {

00025 IpaDatasetLoader::IpaDatasetLoader() {
00026         imageSize = cvSize(-1, -1);
00027 
00028         xyzImage = 0;
00029         colorImage = 0;
00030 
00031         xyzExtension = "_coloredPC_xyz_32F3.xml";
00032         zExtensionPNG = "_coloredPC_xyz_8U3.png";
00033         colorExtension = "_coloredPC_color_8U3.png";
00034 }
00035 
00036 IpaDatasetLoader::~IpaDatasetLoader() {
00037         release();
00038 }
00039 
00040 void IpaDatasetLoader::release(void) {
00041         if (xyzImage) {
00042                 cvReleaseImage(&xyzImage);
00043                 xyzImage = 0;
00044         }
00045         if (colorImage) {
00046                 cvReleaseImage(&colorImage);
00047                 colorImage = 0;
00048         }
00049 }
00050 
00051 bool IpaDatasetLoader::loadColoredPointCloud(std::string pathAndName) {
00052         release();
00053         setlocale(LC_NUMERIC, "C");
00054         std::string imageFileName;
00055 
00056         imageFileName = pathAndName + xyzExtension; // i.e. "name_xyz_Coord.xml";
00057         xyzImage = (IplImage*)cvLoad(imageFileName.c_str());
00058         if (xyzImage == 0)
00059         {
00060                 LOG(ERROR) << "ColoredPointCloud::LoadColoredPointCloud: Could not load xyz image " << imageFileName;
00061                 return false;
00062         }
00063 
00064         imageFileName = pathAndName + colorExtension; // i.e. "name_xyz_Shared.png";
00065         colorImage = cvLoadImage(imageFileName.c_str());
00066         if (colorImage == 0)
00067         {
00068                 std::cerr << "ColoredPointCloud::LoadColoredPointCloud:" << std::endl;
00069                 std::cerr << "\t ...  Could not load color image" << std::endl;
00070                 std::cerr << "\t ... '" << imageFileName << "'\n";
00071                 return false;
00072         }
00073 
00074         imageSize = cvSize(colorImage->width, colorImage->height);
00075 
00076         return true;
00077 }
00078

00080 
00081 IplImage* IpaDatasetLoader::getXYZImage() {
00082         return xyzImage;
00083 }
00084 
00085 IplImage* IpaDatasetLoader::getColorImage() {
00086         return colorImage;
00087 }
00088 
00089 bool IpaDatasetLoader::getData(int i, int j, double& x, double& y, double& z, unsigned char& R, unsigned char& G, unsigned char& B) {
00090         if (xyzImage == NULL || colorImage == NULL) {
00091                 LOG(ERROR) << "ColoredPointCloud::GetData: Color image or intensity image is a NULL-pointer";
00092                 return false;
00093         }
00094 
00095         if (i >= xyzImage->width ||
00096                         i >= colorImage->width ||
00097                         i < 0 ||
00098                         j >= xyzImage->height ||
00099                         j >= colorImage->height ||
00100                         j < 0) {
00101 
00102                 LOG(ERROR) << "ColoredPointCloud::GetData: Parameter of color image or intensity image is out of bounds";
00103                 return false;
00104         }
00105 
00106         float* ptrXYZ = &((float*) (xyzImage->imageData + j * xyzImage->widthStep))[i * 3];
00107         x = (double) ptrXYZ[0];
00108         y = (double) ptrXYZ[1];
00109         z = (double) ptrXYZ[2];
00110 
00111         unsigned char* ptr = &((unsigned char*) (colorImage->imageData + j * colorImage->widthStep))[i * 3];
00112         B = ptr[0];
00113         G = ptr[1];
00114         R = ptr[2];
00115 
00116         return true;
00117 }
00118 
00119 PointCloud3D* IpaDatasetLoader::getPointCloud() {
00120 
00121         PointCloud3D* pointCloud = new PointCloud3D();
00122 
00123         double x = 0.0;
00124         double y = 0.0;
00125         double z = 0.0;
00126         unsigned char red;
00127         unsigned char green;
00128         unsigned char blue;
00129 
00130 
00131         /* loop over all pixels and add those who are above a certain threshold */
00132         for (int row = 0; row < xyzImage->height; ++row) {
00133                 for (int col = 0; col < xyzImage->width; ++col) {
00134                         this->getData(row, col, x, y, z, red, green, blue);
00135 
00136                         if (!((red == 0) && (green == 0) && (blue == 0))) { //discard "black" points as they don't belong to the object itself
00137                                 pointCloud->addPoint(Point3D(x, y, z));
00138                         }
00139                 }
00140         }
00141 
00142         /* plausibility check */
00143         assert(pointCloud->getSize() >= 0u && pointCloud->getSize() <= static_cast<unsigned int>(xyzImage->imageSize));
00144 
00145         return pointCloud;
00146 }
00147 
00148 PointCloud3D* IpaDatasetLoader::getColoredPointCloud() {
00149 
00150         PointCloud3D* pointCloud = new PointCloud3D();
00151 
00152         double x = 0.0;
00153         double y = 0.0;
00154         double z = 0.0;
00155         unsigned char red;
00156         unsigned char green;
00157         unsigned char blue;
00158 
00159 
00160         /* loop over all pixels and add those who are above a certain threshold */
00161         for (int row = 0; row < xyzImage->height; ++row) {
00162                 for (int col = 0; col < xyzImage->width; ++col) {
00163                         this->getData(row, col, x, y, z, red, green, blue);
00164 
00165                         if (!((red == 0) && (green == 0) && (blue == 0))) { //discard "black" points as they don't belong to the object itself
00166                                 pointCloud->addPointPtr(new ColoredPoint3D(new Point3D(x, y, z), red, green, blue));
00167                         }
00168                 }
00169         }
00170 
00171         /* plausibility check */
00172         assert(pointCloud->getSize() >= 0u && pointCloud->getSize() <= static_cast<unsigned int>(xyzImage->imageSize));
00173 
00174         return pointCloud;
00175 }
